root.name: Zumba Fitness
root.description: OverviewZumba Fitness features 9 different dance styles and "more than 30" Zumba routines developed by Zumba pioneer Beto and some celebrityDancing !instructors such as Gena Grant and Tanya Beardsley. Zumba Fitness is Kinect compatible, letting you dance for over 20 minutes uninterrupted. The game features a variety of dance styles from rock to salsa and takes some cues from other dance games such as showing your silhouette where you flash green when you're doing good and red when you're doing bad.Xbox 360 Game InstallationWhen installed on the Xbox 360 Hard Drive, the game takes up 3.9GB of space. Load times are significantly shortened as a result.
